name: Leg it!
description:
This would be the first attempt at creating the basics of the game, as well as uploading into the public domain. I have jumped into Unity with the assistance of the Playmaker plugin to provide functionality. At its raw form it is a Platform / Puzzle game set in an obscure dimension. This Traveler ( You the player ) are legging it to the next portal back home.

Use E to interact with machines

Arrows to Move - Space to Jump

This project is a final for game design course -- I would hope to sharpen my skills by reevaluating my methods without the stress of deadlines to have a more polished product as I am inspired to do so.

Thank you for your time!
